attributes.action: instruct the Chief  UK Police officer to investigate expense fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There has been considerable concern recently across political party boundaries that bogus expenses have been claimed by Members of Parliament. I would like to see the PM instruct the most senior police officer in the country to investigate each and every allegation, and where evidence is found that fraud has taken place, to ensure that the DPP brings appropriate criminal charges against the individuals concerned.

rejection.details: Suspected crimes can be reported to the police, who will decide whether to investigate and present any evidence to the Crown Prosecution Service, who will decide whether to bring the case to court.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
